item.description: DS Fia Lucey is back in her hometown of Blackwater to investigate a missing person case.

item.description: Dan’s first day in prison unravels as he underestimates his class – and his own past.

item.description: Former players and celebrity guests discuss the first episode of series 4.

item.description: Pine’s past resurfaces as he’s pulled into a deadly conspiracy that takes him to Colombia.

item.description: Easter, 2000. Taciturn detective Jay Swan is perplexed by attitudes in a troubled town.

item.description: Darius is tested by a violent new pupil, who also unlocks a secret from Agnes’s past.

item.description: A collection of over 40 tracks from such artists as Gloria Gaynor and Destiny's Child.

item.description: Meera Syal, Henning Wehn, Martine McCutcheon and Gary Wilmot join Rob, Lee and David.

item.description: Debbie has news for Harry: his dad isn’t dead, he’s just hiding in the loft.

item.description: Dom and Kay start new roles at MI5, but each of them struggles to find their place.

item.description: The vampires' long-lost fifth roommate returns.

item.description: Lucy Worsley takes on the case of a Victorian serial killer who was never caught.

item.description: Banjo Beale and husband Ro transform a crumbling island mansion into a dream hotel.

item.description: Former best friends divided by grief try to rebuild the trust between them.

item.description: A self-styled shaman wreaks havoc after offering spiritual help at a heavy price.

item.description: Monty travels along the Rhine to visit its gardens, starting at its source in the Alps.

item.description: Paddy McGuinness visits a massive factory producing 80 million chips every day.

item.description: Rick Stein returns to Sydney to explore its ever-evolving culinary landscape.

item.description: The incredible Desiree Burch introduces Suzi Ruffell and Finlay Christie to the stage.

item.description: RuPaul presents the international icons competing to be Queen of the Mothertucking World.

item.description: After hitting an iceberg, the captain realises Titanic is going to sink.
